channel.title: Day By Day English
channel.description: Your daily English podcast to grow slowly, day by day.

item.title: Welcome to Day By Day English 👋
item.description: This is the first episode of the podcast. Let's start together!

item.title: Episode 2 - Feelings 💖
item.description: Today, we talk about feelings 💖. Repeat after me and practice your emotions in English.

item.title: Episode 3 - Summer and Vacation in France ☀️🏖️
item.description: Today, we talk about summer and vacations in France. Repeat after me and practice your English with holiday vocabulary!
